definition: conveniently/in passing/without much extra effort
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
see 便宜|便宜[pian2 yi5]

sentences.english: We can drop by the bar and go for a drink.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以顺便去酒吧喝一杯。

sentences.english: By the way, the number of the telephone on your desk is extension 506.
sentences.chinese: 顺便说一下，你桌上的电话号码是分机506。

sentences.english: The night watchman brought the armchair for Hewson. He tried to make him laugh.
sentences.chinese: 守夜人给休森搬来了一张椅子，顺便逗一下他。

sentences.english: But the way , have you seen Mr Zang . our manager ?
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一声，你见到我们的张经理吗？

sentences.english: Please give my love to your parents.
sentences.chinese: 顺便请代向你父母问候。

sentences.english: My father always picks me up after school.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲常开车顺便接我。

sentences.english: On my way home I stopped at my aunt's.
sentences.chinese: 回家途中我顺便到姑妈那儿去了一会儿。

sentences.english: I'd like to drop by and see you sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 我想在下周某个时候顺便来看看你。

sentences.english: The beetle's rainbow colors, by the way, are all natural.
sentences.chinese: 顺便说下，叶甲身上彩虹般的颜色都是天然的。

sentences.english: And we would need, to have to look at it, and it's going to be very tricky, by the way, as to what the right answer is.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要去看一看，顺便说下，正确答案可能很棘手。

sentences.english: This also includes other caffeinated drinks, by the way.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一下，这也包括其他含咖啡因的饮料。

sentences.english: And btw, all the Chinese Pollutionfigures are fudged.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一句，所有有关中国污染的诗句都是捏造的。

sentences.english: I'd like to drop in and see you sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 我想在下周什么时候顺便来看看你。

sentences.english: He dropped in on some old comrades on his vacation trip to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 他在去北京度假时顺便访问一些老同志。

sentences.english: Komodo dragon, by the way, why does man have to take him all away?
sentences.chinese: 顺便说说，科莫多龙。为什么人们都要夺走你的生命？

sentences.english: By the way, I like your beard.
sentences.chinese: 顺便说一句，我喜欢你的胡子。

definition: on the way
(do sth) in passing/incidentally (while doing sth else)
specially/intentionally
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
to have time (to do sth)
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
well/carefully/nicely/properly
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
from time to time
to find the time to do sth
can't say for sure/maybe
to request sb to do sth/please!
specially/for a special purpose
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
old variant of 幫|帮[bang1]
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
old variant of 幫|帮[bang1]
